verses.verse: וּבַשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> u-vash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִעִ֜ית <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'It And in the seventh הִתְחַזַּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> hit-chaz-Zak strengthened יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da', Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach himself and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei the captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot of hundreds לַעֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H5838><s%> la-'a-zar-Ya-hu Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְרֹחָ֡ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham of Jeroham וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> u-le-yish-ma-'El and Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְ֠הוֹחָנָן <S%H3076><s%> Ye-ho-cha-non of Jehohanan וְלַֽעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H5838><s%> ve-la-'a-zar-Ya-hu and Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עוֹבֵ֜ד <S%H5744><s%> o-Ved of Obed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַעֲשֵׂיָ֧הוּ <S%H4641><s%> ma-'a-se-Ya-hu and Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son עֲדָיָ֛הוּ <S%H5718><s%> 'a-da-Ya-hu of Adaiah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֱלִישָׁפָ֥ט <S%H478><s%> 'e-li-sha-Fat and Elishaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> zich-Ri of Zichri עִמּ֥וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo into בַבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> vab-be-Rit. into covenant

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <S%H5437><s%> vai-ya-Sob-bu And they went about בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> bi-hu-Dah, in Judah וַיִּקְבְּצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-be-Tzu and gathered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְרָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ve-ra-Shei and the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. to Jerusalem

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot made כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַקָּהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal And all the congregation בְּרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; with the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, to them הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech unto them Behold the king's יִמְלֹ֔ךְ <S%H4427><s%> yim-Loch, shall reign כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons דָוִֽיד׃ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid. of David

זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֨ית <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shit A third part מִכֶּ֜ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem who בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ei of you entering הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-lal-vi-Yim, and of the Levites לְשֹֽׁעֲרֵ֖י <S%H7778><s%> le-sho-'a-Rei [shall be] porters הַסִּפִּֽים׃ <S%H5592><s%> has-sip-Pim. of the doors

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit And a third part בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, [shall be] at the king's וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit and a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> be-Sha-'ar at the gate הַיְס֑וֹד <S%H3247><s%> hay-Sod; of the foundation וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, and all the people בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <S%H2691><s%> be-chatz-Rot [shall be] in the courts בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- no יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo But let none come בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- into the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim save the priests וְהַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <S%H8334><s%> ve-ham-sha-re-Tim and they that minister לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim, of the Levites הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u they shall go in כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh for they [are] holy הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah; and let וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, but all the people יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-me-Ru shall keep מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the watch יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהִקִּיפוּ֩ <S%H5362><s%> ve-hik-ki-Fu shall compass הַלְוִיִּ֨ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim And the Levites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> ve-che-Lav with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ve-hab-Ba and whosoever [else] cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit into the house יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat; he shall be put to death וִֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vih-Yu become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- Thus be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech but be ye with the king בְּבֹא֥וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O when he cometh in וּבְצֵאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3318><s%> u-ve-tze-To. and when he goeth out

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su did הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim So the Levites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, and all Judah כְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּה֮ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' according to all things that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu and took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shav, one בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ei that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im were to יוֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> yotz-'Ei with them that were to go הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat; [out] on the sabbath כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not פָטַ֛ר <S%H6362><s%> fa-Tar dismiss יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <S%H4256><s%> Ham-mach-le-Kot. not the courses

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' Moreover Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> le-sa-Rei to the captains הַמֵּא֗וֹת <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot, of hundreds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽחֲנִיתִים֙ <S%H2595><s%> ha-cha-ni-Tim spears וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמָּגִנּוֹת֙ <S%H4043><s%> ham-ma-gin-nOt and bucklers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <S%H7982><s%> hash-she-la-Tim, and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech that [had been] king דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit which [were] in the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Med And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am all the people וְאִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish every man שִׁלְח֣וֹ <S%H7973><s%> shil-Cho having his weapon בְיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Do, in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> mik-Ke-tef side הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit from the right עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <S%H8042><s%> has-se-ma-Lit, to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> lam-miz-Be-ach along by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> ve-lab-Ba-yit; and the temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech by the king סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tzi-'u Then they brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king's וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu and put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H5145><s%> han-Ne-zer upon him the crown וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yam-Li-chu and made him king אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4886><s%> vai-yim-sha-Chu-hu anointed יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' And Jehoiada וּבָנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nav, and his sons וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru him and said יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> ye-Chi God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king ס sa-Mek

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vat-tish-Ma' heard עֲתַלְיָ֗הוּ <S%H6271><s%> 'a-tal-Ya-hu, Now when Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the noise הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people הָֽרָצִ֔ים <S%H7323><s%> ha-ra-Tzim, running וְהַֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <S%H1984><s%> ve-ham-hal-Lim and praising אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; the king וַתָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to the people בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD
